verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and drop <S%H5197><s%> your word toward the holy places <S%H4720><s%>, and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>,

And say <S%H559><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Behold <S%H3318><s%>, I am against you, and will draw forth my sword <S%H2719><s%> out of his sheath <S%H8593><s%>, and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from you the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

Seeing <S%H3282><s%> then that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from you the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, therefore shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his sheath <S%H8593><s%> against all flesh <S%H1320><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%>:

That all flesh <S%H1320><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have drawn forth <S%H3318><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> out of his sheath <S%H8593><s%>: it shall not return any more <S%H7725><s%>.

Sigh <S%H584><s%> therefore <S%H1121><s%>, you son of man <S%H120><s%>, with the breaking <S%H7670><s%> of your body <S%H4975><s%>; and with bitterness <S%H4814><s%> sigh <S%H584><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H559><s%>, when they say unto you <S%H584><s%>, Therefore sighest you <S%H559><s%>? that you shall answer, For the news <S%H8052><s%>; because it comes <S%H935><s%>: and every heart <S%H3820><s%> shall melt <S%H4549><s%>, and all hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble <S%H7503><s%>, and every spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall faint <S%H3543><s%>, and all knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H3212><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>: behold <S%H935><s%>, it comes, and shall be brought to pass <S%H1961><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Say <S%H559><s%>, A sword <S%H2719><s%>, a sword <S%H2719><s%> is sharpened <S%H2300><s%>, and also polished <S%H4803><s%>:

It is sharpened <S%H2300><s%> to make a severe <S%H2874><s%> slaughter <S%H2873><s%>; it is polished <S%H4178><s%> that it may glitter <S%H1300><s%>: should <S%H176><s%> we then make mirth <S%H7797><s%>? it rejects <S%H3988><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%>, as every tree <S%H6086><s%>.

And he has given <S%H5414><s%> it to be polished <S%H4803><s%>, that it may be handled <S%H3709><s%>: this sword <S%H2719><s%> is sharpened <S%H2300><s%>, and it is polished <S%H4178><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the slayer <S%H2026><s%>.

Cry <S%H2199><s%> and howl <S%H3213><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>: for it shall be upon my people <S%H5971><s%>, it shall be upon all the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: terrors <S%H4048><s%> by reason of <S%H413><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be upon my people <S%H5971><s%>: strike <S%H5606><s%> therefore upon your thigh <S%H3409><s%>.
Because it is a trial <S%H974><s%>, and what if the sword show contempt to <S%H3988><s%> even the rod <S%H7626><s%>? it shall be no more <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

You therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and strike <S%H5221><s%> your hands <S%H3709><s%> together <S%H5221><s%>, and let the sword <S%H2719><s%> be doubled <S%H3717><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> time <S%H2719><s%>, the sword of the slain <S%H2491><s%>: it is the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> men that are slain <S%H2491><s%>, which enters into their private chambers <S%H2314><s%>.

I have set <S%H5414><s%> the point <S%H19><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> against all their gates <S%H8179><s%>, that their heart <S%H3820><s%> may faint <S%H4127><s%>, and their ruins <S%H4383><s%> be multiplied <S%H7235><s%>: ah <S%H253><s%>! it is made <S%H6213><s%> bright <S%H1300><s%>, it is wrapped up <S%H4593><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2874><s%>.
Go you one way or other <S%H258><s%>, either on <S%H7760><s%> the right hand <S%H3231><s%>, or on the left <S%H8041><s%>, wherever <S%H575><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> is set <S%H3259><s%>.
I will also strike <S%H5221><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> together <S%H3709><s%>, and I will cause my fury <S%H2534><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%>: I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have said it <S%H1696><s%>.
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me again <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Also <S%H1121><s%>, you son of man <S%H120><s%>, appoint <S%H7760><s%> you two <S%H8147><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, that the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> may come <S%H935><s%>: both two <S%H8147><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of one <S%H259><s%> land <S%H776><s%>: and choose <S%H1254><s%> you a place <S%H3027><s%>, choose <S%H1254><s%> it at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Appoint <S%H7760><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%>, that the sword <S%H2719><s%> may come <S%H935><s%> to Rabbath <S%H7237><s%> of the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%>, and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the fortified <S%H1219><s%>.

For the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at the parting <S%H517><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%>, at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, to use <S%H7080><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%>: he made his arrows <S%H2671><s%> bright <S%H7043><s%>, he consulted <S%H7592><s%> with images <S%H8655><s%>, he looked <S%H7200><s%> in the liver <S%H3516><s%>.

At his right hand <S%H3225><s%> was the divination <S%H7081><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to appoint <S%H7760><s%> captains <S%H3733><s%>, to open <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the slaughter <S%H7524><s%>, to lift up <S%H7311><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> with shouting <S%H8643><s%>, to appoint <S%H7760><s%> battering rams <S%H3733><s%> against the gates <S%H8179><s%>, to cast <S%H8210><s%> a mountain <S%H5550><s%>, and to build <S%H1129><s%> a fort <S%H1785><s%>.

And it shall be unto them as a false <S%H7723><s%> divination <S%H7080><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>, to them that have sworn <S%H7650><s%> oaths <S%H7621><s%>: but he will call to memory <S%H2142><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, that they may be taken <S%H8610><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Because you have made your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to be remembered <S%H2142><s%>, in that your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are discovered <S%H1540><s%>, so that in all your doings <S%H5949><s%> your sins <S%H2403><s%> do appear <S%H7200><s%>; because <S%H2142><s%>, I say, that you are come to memory, you shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> with the hand <S%H3709><s%>.

And you <S%H2491><s%>, profane wicked <S%H7563><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whose day <S%H3117><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, when <S%H6256><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall have a end <S%H7093><s%>,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Remove <S%H5493><s%> the diadem <S%H4701><s%>, and take off <S%H7311><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%>: this shall not be the same <S%H2063><s%>: exalt <S%H1361><s%> him that is low <S%H8217><s%>, and abase <S%H8213><s%> him that is high <S%H1364><s%>.

I will overturn <S%H5754><s%>, overturn <S%H5754><s%>, overturn <S%H5754><s%>, it <S%H7760><s%>: and it shall be no more <S%H935><s%>, until he come whose right <S%H4941><s%> it is <S%H5414><s%>; and I will give it him.

And you <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> concerning the Ammonites <S%H1121><s%>, and concerning their reproach <S%H2781><s%>; even say <S%H559><s%> you <S%H2719><s%>, The sword, the sword <S%H2719><s%> is drawn <S%H6605><s%>: for the slaughter <S%H2874><s%> it is polished <S%H4803><s%>, to consume <S%H398><s%> because of the glittering <S%H1300><s%>:

While they see <S%H2372><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%> unto you <S%H7080><s%>, while they divine a lie <S%H3577><s%> unto you <S%H5414><s%>, to bring you upon the necks <S%H6677><s%> of them that are slain <S%H2491><s%>, of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, whose day <S%H3117><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, when <S%H6256><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall have a end <S%H7093><s%>.

Shall I cause it to return <S%H7725><s%> into his sheath <S%H8593><s%>? I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you in the place <S%H4725><s%> where you were created <S%H1254><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of your nativity <S%H4351><s%>.

And I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> my indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon you <S%H6315><s%>, I will blow against you in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>, and deliver <S%H5414><s%> you into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of brutish <S%H1197><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and skillful <S%H2796><s%> to destroy <S%H4889><s%>.

You shall be for fuel <S%H402><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%>; your blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; you shall be no more remembered <S%H2142><s%>: for I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.
